basics.name: Usman Asim
basics.label: Computer Vision Engineer, MLOps Engineer
basics.summary: A results-oriented AI Research and Development Engineer with over 4 years of expertise in Computer Vision, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and Automation/MLOps. Passionate about devising improved problem-solving methods for complex tasks and eager to embrace new technologies and tools.

work.name: DeltaX.ai
work.position: Team Lead / AI Researcher - Computer Vision
work.summary: Leading a team specializing in model deployment on edge devices, AI/CNN Model optimization, and MLOps-related initiatives.
highlights: LG Display - Smart Roof Display development
Hyundai Mobis - Cabin Monitoring System and Driver Monitoring System projects

work.name: UNOMIC Co. Ltd
work.summary: Designed and implemented CI/CD Pipeline and developed a cloud-native Alzheimer’s Disease Detection App.

work.name: AI Vision Lab CAU
work.summary: Contributed to image segmentation, brain stroke image generation, and maritime object detection projects.

work.name: ARFA Software Technology Park
work.summary: Worked on Offline Signature Verification and CNN Segmentation Experiments.

awards.title: The Chung-Ang University Young Scientist Scholarship
Gold Prize Winner of Speed Programming
